duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain anesthesia service areas in readiness for use by Anesthesiologists and Anesthetists.
Accountable for anesthesia equipment and supplies, adherence to infection control and safety policies.
Assist Anesthesiologists with patient positioning, preparation of sterile fields, and application of anesthesia techniques.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma/GED with 6 months to 1 year of previous experience as an Anesthesia Technician. CPR certification required.
